name: Precision Highlight Pencil
description:
This is a highlight pencil for creating precise or soft highlights across skin tones.

LUSTRO is a cool-champagne, satin-pearl.
ORO is a warm-champagne, satin-pearl.

This fine-tip highlighting pencil allows you to create both a precise or diffused highlight anywhere on the face. Line lids to bring brightness to the eyes, use on brow bone, cupids bow, or high-points of cheeks for glow effect, or use on top of any lip colour for added lustre. The champagne pearl pigment is designed to create radiance across skin tones.

Designed for application wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, cheek bones or elsewhere. Draw on and blend out with brush or fingers for a highlight effect.

Made in Italy.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Cream Contour Stick
description:
Developed in only two shades, CREAM CONTOUR STICK is ultra creamy, blendable, and buildable, allowing for versatility across skin tones.

The contour stick can be used to create soft shadows, or as a bronzer to bring warmth to the face. The super creamy texture applies with ease and blends for a finish that looks like skin. The light-weight formula is designed to work across different skin textures and tones, and does not settle into pores or fine lines.

TEA is a warm-toned medium brown that works well on fair to medium skin tones.
KAVE is a neutral deep-brown that works well on medium-deep to deep skin tones.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

CREAM FORMULA
Hydrating dewy finish that looks like real skin.

ULTRA-FINE PIGMENT
Delivers sheer, buildable coverage

RESPONSIBLE
This formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and is contained in single-origin recyclable packaging.

TEA INGREDIENTS: DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, POLYGLYCERYL-2 TRIISOSTEARATE , OCTYLDODECANOL, SYNTHETIC WAX, SILICA, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77492 (IRON OXIDE), VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, MICA, EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX, CI 77491 (IRON OXIDE), CI 77499 (IRON OXIDE), 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE COPOLYMER, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE.

KAVE INGREDIENTS: DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, POLYGLYCERYL-2 TRIISOSTEARATE , OCTYLDODECANOL, SYNTHETIC WAX, SILICA, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, CI 77499 (IRON OXIDE), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDE), VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, CI 77019 MICA, EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX, CI 77492 (IRON OXIDE), 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE COPOLYMER, CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), TOCOPHERYL ACETATE.

Vegan & Cruelty free
Made in South Korea

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

name: Lash Tint Mascara
description:
LASH TINT MASCARA is a one-of-a kind, multi-purpose mascara than can be used to add a subtle tint of colour to lashes and brows.

This light-weight, smudge and flake proof mascara creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes and brows. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of hairs from fine to full. The precise wand and tubing formula provides a clean, smudge-free application and wear.

Made in the same lightweight, smudge-proof formula as the Black Lash Tint Mascara, the new Brown and Taupe shades allow for use in both lashes and brows for various hair colours.

TAUPE is a cool-toned light brown.
BROWN is a neutral chocolate brown.
BLACK is very black.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
LASH TINT MASCARA is a one-of-a kind, multi-purpose mascara than can be used to add a subtle tint of colour to lashes and brows.

This light-weight, smudge and flake proof mascara creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes and brows. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of hairs from fine to full. The precise wand and tubing formula provides a clean, smudge-free application and wear.

Made in the same lightweight, smudge-proof formula as the Black Lash Tint Mascara, the new Brown and Taupe shades allow for use in both lashes and brows for various hair colours.

name: Tinted Matte Balm
description:
A moisturizing, satin-matte balm that glides on for lightweight colour in a universal shade of plum. Formulated with natural oils and wax for comfortable, moisturizing wear on lips, eyes and cheeks.

Tinted Matte Balm comes with a pencil sharpener, designed for this unique wide wooden pencil.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

VERSATILE
One universal plum shade that can be used on lips, cheeks, or lids.

NO-FUSS APPLICATION
This no-fuss formula can be applied without a mirror, and the smooth, matte-balm texture is buildable, and can be worn on its own of layered with other products.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE
This formula is vegan cruelty-free.

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

INGREDIENTS: MICA, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX, EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE, ORYZANOL, TOCOPHEROL, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE. MAY CONTAIN [+/-]: RED IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), BLACK IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850).

name: Colour Set Setting Powder
description:
Description BENEFITS INGREDIENTS SHIPPING

A no-fuss, pocket perfect setting powder for eliminating shine and prolonging the wear time of makeup.

This weightless translucent powder can be applied on top of the PRECISION COLOUR PENCIL to stop colour transfer and increase wear-time, or can be applied to skin to eliminate shine. The super finely-milled silica allows the translucent shade to work across skin tones to set makeup without altering the colour, and to absorb oil.

Formulated without talc, silicones or nanoparticles. Vegan and cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

WEIGHTLESS FORMULA
Ultra-fine powder that creates a weightless matte veil to absorb oil and prevent makeup transfer.

POCKET PERFECT
Compact size that is perfect for on-the-go touch ups.

RESPONSIBLE
This formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of harmful ingredients.

SILICA, POLYQUATERNIUM-80, MALTOL.

A FRANK DECONSTRUCTION OF OUR FROMULATION:

Silica - a natural mineral found in clays that absorbs oils

Polyquaternium-80 - conditioning agent

Maltol - a natural anti-oxidizer

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

RETURNS

name: Graphite Brow Pencil
description:
A dual-ended brow pencil for defining your eyebrows.

Inspired by the texture of a graphite drawing pencil, this easy to use, hard formula allows for drawing precise, hair-like strokes, while the powdery finish creates easy, smooth application and blendability, with a spoolie on one end, for blending out your pencil and combing your brows.

LIGHT is a cool-toned grey-brown, designed for blonde and light brown brows or those looking for softer definition.

DARK is a cool-toned grey-black, designed for brown, and black brows, or those looking for strong definition.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: High-Shine Gloss
description:
High-Shine Gloss is a clear, hydrating gloss made with ceramides and sodium hyaluronate for a moisturizing and plumping effect.

This lightweight, gel-cushion formula is completely clear with super fine flecks of mica to add shine to lips, cheek bones, eye lids, or elsewhere.

Blend with Precision Colour Pencil for diffused, dewy colour.

Made in Canada.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Precision Colour Pencil
description:
APPLICATION TIPS

LIPSTICK: Line and fill in lips with the Precision Colour Pencil, or use Tapered Multi-Brush to blend colour onto lips. Wear alone or top with High-Shine Gloss for a dewy effect.

LIP LINER: Line lips with the pencil and finish with High-Shine Gloss or lip colour of choice.

EYELINER: Line lash line with pencil. Smudge with Tapered Multi-Brush for a smokey effect, or tap translucent powder on top to enhance wear.

EYESHADOW: Dot colour over eyelids and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

BLUSH/CONTOUR: Dot colour onto cheeks and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

HIGHLIGHT: Use highlight pencil on inner corners of eyes, along lash line, on high points of cheeks, cupid’s bow or brow bone.
